nodes.text: Kello was a man who lived during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

During the time of the Clone Wars, Kello was among a group of couriers that were sent by the criminal Vex to collect an illicit cargo from the jungles of Cularin. Kello flew a swoop to the rendezvous point where they were collecting the cargo, but no-one was there to meet the couriers and Kello became nervous. They were then attacked by a group of enforcers who were working for the Hutt Riboga. The enforcers detonated some thermal mines and Kello swerved his swoop to avoid the blast from one. However, he was killed moments later by a volley of blaster fire, which shattered the body armor he was wearing.
